description:
All-day shredding with all-day safety. This hardshell helmet is built for a full season of tricks and turns. With a tough ABS outer, the Scout can handle your learning curve while looking out for your brain. Vents keep the air flowing in, plus you can remove the earpads when the cardio really kicks in.

  • ABS hardshell construction balances protection and strength with durability
  • EPS inner absorbs and dissipates energy from side impacts and collisions
  • Venting keeps airflow moving to control the climate inside
  • Elastic fit system self-adjusts for each use
  • Removable ear pads make spring days less sweaty
  • Side release buckle for glove-friendly on/off
name: Smith Scout Snow Helmet - Unisex
